THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OP EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
TRUST; Wo K* KELLOGG FOUNDATION
FINANCIAL STATEMENT
F<ar Fiscal Year,, 1956=495?
Balance, July 1, 1956 (Per 1955-56 report) $ 009.00
Received from W, K. Kellogg Foundation 46,221.00
Other Income (fcrfd from Network Account) (1) 3,840,00
Total Receipts 8 50*, 061.00
Expenditures (per attached report) 44,453.25
Balance (cash on hand) $ 5,607.75
(1) The request to the W. K. Kellogg Foundation for a three-year grant (for the
period July 1, 1956 to June 30, 1959), and the terms of the subsequent grant,
stipulated that, of the total proposed annual budget for Headquarters, $3,840
was to be obtained from income other than the grant (such as sale of publications,
reimbursable services, etc.). Since, under our agreement with the University of
Illinois, such miscellaneou income must be credited to our Network account,
this $3,840 had first to accrue to the latter account and then be transferred to the
Ttusts Kellogg account.
